attributes.action: To Include "None Of The Above" on all voting slips in all elections in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
To give people the option of putting their x on "none of the above"
You will instantly significantly increase the amount of people who vote,it will also stop people voting for an extreme party and gaining them airtime they shouldn't.
It will make the already elected on large majorities actually earn their re-election and not just expect it.
It will change politics.

rejection.details:
Please see:

Petition Title: Include No Confidence vote on ballot papers

Created by: Chris Richards

Closing:01/11/2014
